title: 1.14启动失败了..
author: 好个骚年
txt_content:
求大佬来看看8今天莫名其妙的就启动不了了 
[15:50:45] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: shi_fen
[15:50:52] [Client thread/WARN]: Skipping bad option: lastServer:
[15:50:52] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 3.2.2 build 10
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x00000001806725a2, pid=1992, tid=0x0000000000001b34
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_211-b12) (build 1.8.0_211-b12)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.211-b12 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [ig4icd64.dll+0x6725a2]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# D:\youxi\MC\.minecraft\hs_err_pid1992.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#

[error occurred during error reporting , id 0xc0000005]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
尝试多分配一点内存呢。

或者试着更新驱动

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
是每次都这样？疑似java运行环境的问题

首先应关闭后台占用较大的程序，并且纯净MC给1024M内存足矣，注意不要给超出剩余物理内存的内存量不然会直接崩溃

另可考虑重新安装64位java。
链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1IRA-pCQvVOq73xJTnCdDag 
提取码：j2rk

replies.txt_content:
